Breadnaught.name: Breadnaught
Breadnaught.description: When diplomacy fails, Grandma fires up the oven... and the minigun.

BarrelSpin.name: Barrel Spin
BarrelSpin.description: Whenever you are about to attack, decrease the damage by {0}, to a minimum of 1. Before the original attack, for each decreased point of damage, attack for 1 damage, retaining any effects. <c=downside>Goes away at start of next turn.</c>

Minigun.name: GRANDMA'S MINIGUN
Minigun.description: After spending any <c=energy>ENERGY</c>, gain that much <c=status>BARREL SPIN</c>.

ImprovedCoolant.name: IMPROVED COOLANT
description: Start each turn with at least 1 <c=status>BARREL SPIN</c>.

RotorGrease.name: ROTOR GREASE
description: Before any attack, first attack once for 0 damage, retaining any effects of the original attack.

title: Can we get the special treat?
<c=heal>-Gain a <c=card>Goodie Bag</c></c>

description.None: Add a <c=card>Basic Ignite / Kickback / Weaken / Overdrive</c> to your hand.
description.A: Add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Basic Ignite / Kickback / Weaken / Overdrive</c> to your hand.
description.B: Add a <c=card>Basic Ignite / Kickback / Weaken / Overdrive</c> to your hand.

Kepler.name: Kepler
Kepler.description: An old war ship with two missile bays and a missile defense system.

Bay.name: KEPLER BAY
Bay.description: At the start of your turn, if you don't have a <c=card>Toggle Bay</c> in your hand, gain one.

BayV2.name: KEPLER BAY V2
description: At the start of your turn, if you don't have a <c=card>Swarm Mode</c> in your hand, gain one.

MissilePDS.name: MISSILE PDS
MissilePDS.description: If a <c=midrow>missile</c> were to hit your inactive missile bay, it is destroyed instead.

MissileTractorBeam.name: MISSILE TRACTOR BEAM
description: If a missile were to hit your inactive missile bay, it is instead removed without destroying it, turned around, and added to your hand in a <c=card>Relaunch</c>.

ToggleBay.name: Toggle Bay
ToggleBay.description: Toggle which missile bay is active.

SwarmMode.name: Swarm Mode
SwarmMode.description: Both missile bays are active until next turn. <c=keyword>Flip to toggle.</c>

Nemesis.name: Nemesis
Nemesis.description: A ship built to withstand punishment and return it with overwhelming force.

PrepareForTrouble.name: PREPARE FOR TROUBLE
PrepareForTrouble.description: At the end of each turn, gain 1 <c=status>TEMPORARY PAYBACK</c>.

AndMakeItDouble.name: AND MAKE IT DOUBLE
AndMakeItDouble.description: At the end of each turn, activate both of your cannons. <c=downside>At the start of each turn, deactivate all but the rightmost cannon.</c>
